summary: Adds decorative clotheslines and other washing-related items throughout Skyrim, for a touch of realism.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#fce5cd][size=4]This mod adds a touch of the ordinary to the homesteads of Skyrim in the form of many clotheslines - and occasionally washboards, basins and scrub brushes. They are simple decorative objects, placed with care in almost every civilized area of the game, with an emphasis on making houses, cabins and occasionally forts feel a little more like home.[/size][/color]

[color=#f6b26b][size=4]New in 1.0: REAL WATER![/size][/color]

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/58084-0-1433232267.gif[/img]
(Thanks Tamira!)

`

[color=#f6b26b][size=3]Video by Thyworm:[/size][/color]

[youtube]vGRRSCEoQR8[/youtube]

`

[color=#f6b26b][size=3]Status:[/size][/color]
At last, the long-awaited Full Release! All cities and towns laundrified! Real water in wash tubs!

[b]100% built-in [/b]support for [b]Expanded Towns and Cities[/b], [b]JK's Skyrim,[/b] [b]Dawn of Skyrim[/b] and more in main file!

On the horizon: DLC version, maybe some modular plugins for specific mods.

`

[color=#f6b26b][size=3]Compatibility:
[/size][/color]This requires only vanilla Skyrim and should be compatible with pretty much everything.
Script-free, close to zero performance impact, and thoroughly cleaned in TES5edit. 

[b]These mods I have personally confirmed to be compatible:[/b]
[color=#cfe2f3]Expanded Towns and Cities[/color]
[color=#cfe2f3]JK's Skyrim[/color]
[color=#cfe2f3]Dawn of Skyrim
Complete Solitude[/color]
[color=#cfe2f3]Beautiful Whiterun[/color]
[color=#cfe2f3]Perfect Whiterun[/color]
[color=#cfe2f3]Cutting Room Floor [/color]
[color=#cfe2f3]Riverwood Reborn 2[/color]
...and hundreds of other mods that I happen to use!

As always, I invite people to test it out and point out any mod conflicts with clothesline placement, and (within reason) I can maybe scoot things around and accommodate you. I'd need screenshots. 

[color=#f6b26b][size=3]Known issues: [/size][/color]
Despite being tucked in out-of-the-way spots, the clotheslines might occasionally interfere with NPC pathing.

`

[color=#f6b26b][size=3]Recommended for use with:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13608/?]Expanded Towns and Cities[/url][/size][/color]

`

[color=#fff2cc][size=5][b]BIG THANKS:[/b][/size][/color]

[size=3]InsanitySorrow for [url=http://tesalliance.org/forums/index.php?/files/file/1325-insanitys-washing-stuffs/]the original meshes and textures.[/url]
Tamira for - among other things - putting real water in the wash tubs!
Jokerine for helping me get this mod off the ground.
SparrowPrince for some good advice.[/size]

`
[size=3][color=#fff2cc]Other Mods I have made:[/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59277]Blood and Silver - Cidhna Mine Expanded[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83060]The Erotic Adventures of Misty Skye[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62338]Female Forsworn Briarhearts[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74959]Hott Interesting NPCs[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70194]Hott Vampires[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75031]Hott Witches[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86514]Hott Dremora[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58857]Hott Argonians[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69104]The Brotherhood of Mead[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58416]Morning Mist Mage Robes[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63477]Bigger Dragon Bridge[/url]
[/size]


[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://static-5.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/65034-1-1430105640.png[/img][/url]
author: Nerd of Prey

files.name: Immersive Laundry 0.5
files.changelogHtml:
!!!!! EXTREMELY IMPORTANT UPDATE REMOVE ALL PREVIOUS VERSIONS AND OVERWRITE ALL FILES !!!!!
Removed *26* redundant meshes in lieu of using texture sets!
Included some important mesh & texture files wrongfully left out of EVERY older version!
Fixed a slew of mesh & testure problems that made everything in my mod look crappy!
Added new normal and specular maps for most laundry! It is actually properly affected by light and shadows now!

files.name: Immersive Laundry 0.6
files.changelogHtml:
Laundry added to Riften and Markarth!
By popular demand, various clotheslines now feature underwear!
Finally fixed washtub meshes so the water is transparent!
New fabric textures are a little closer to the original look, which works better with my new normal maps.

files.name: Immersive Laundry 1.0
files.changelogHtml:
FULL RELEASE! Mod is finally in a reasonably finished state!
Laundry added to Solitude!
REAL WATER in the wash tubs!
More "real" clothes to steal, if you're that type...
New file structure and many other miscellaneous tweaks!

files.name: Immersive Laundry 1.0a Plugin Update
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed a mysterious floating clothesline in Rorikstead
Wash tubs should no longer display text suggesting that you can activate them
